bulkDecollateralizeTokens(SolidWorldMana.details: Bulk-decollateralizes ERC20 tokens into multiple ERC1155 tokens with specified amountsprior to calling, msg.sender must approve SolidWorldManager to spend `sum(amountsIn)` ERC20 tokens_batchIds must belong to the same Categorywill trigger a rebalance of the Category

params._storage: Struct containing the current state used or modified by this function
params.amountsOutMin: minimum output amounts of ERC1155 tokens for transaction to succeed

decollateralizeTokens(SolidWorldManagerS.details: Decollateralizes `amountIn` of ERC20 tokens and sends `amountOut` ERC1155 tokens with id `batchId` to msg.senderprior to calling, msg.sender must approve SolidWorldManager to spend `amountIn` ERC20 tokenswill trigger a rebalance of the Category

params._storage: Struct containing the current state used or modified by this function
params.amountOutMin: minimum output amount of ERC1155 tokens for transaction to succeed

getBatchesDecollateralizationInfo(SolidW.details: Computes relevant info for the decollateralization process involving batches that match the specified `projectId` and `vintage`

params._storage: Struct containing the current state used or modified by this function
params.projectId: id of the project the batch belongs to

returns.result: array of relevant info about matching batches

params._storage: Struct containing the current state used or modified by this function
params.boostedDecollateralizationFee: fee for decollateralizing ERC20 tokens in case of a certified batch

params._storage: Struct containing the current state used or modified by this function

simulateDecollateralization(SolidWorldMa.details: Simulates decollateralization of `amountIn` ERC20 tokens for ERC1155 tokens with id `batchId`

params._storage: Struct containing the current state used or modified by this function

returns.amountOut: ERC1155 tokens to be received by msg.sender
returns.minAmountIn: minimum amount of ERC20 tokens to decollateralize `amountOut` ERC1155 tokens with id `batchId`
returns.minCbtDaoCut: ERC20 tokens to be received by feeReceiver for decollateralizing minAmountIn ERC20 tokens

simulateReverseDecollateralization(Solid.details: Computes the `minCbt` ERC20 tokens that needs to be decollateralized to obtain `forwardCreditsAmount` ERC1155 tokens

params._storage: Struct containing the current state used or modified by this function

returns.minCbt: minimum amount of ERC20 tokens that needs to be decollateralized
returns.minCbtDaoCut: amount of ERC20 tokens to be received by `feeReceiver` for decollateralizing `minCbt` ERC20 tokens

DECOLLATERALIZATION_SIMULATION_INPUT().notice: Constant used as input for decollateralization simulation for ordering batches with the same category and vintage
